attributes.action: Stop the 20 mile an hour in Wales
attributes.additional_details: Because the traffic is bad enough in Wales this will cause more road chaos and we don't want it everywhere in Wales by schools yes the while country is going mad about it
attributes.background: We are all for 20 mile an hour by schools but not everywhere in Wales

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. 

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.senedd.wales/
